description: Interprets the basic intent of a line of text to an NPC

examples.input: Hello there
Pee Pee Poo Poo
What do you know about the magic ring?
Thank you for your help, bye
You are very cool.
Prepare to fight
Bye now
I will buy that purple longsword
I will sell my common longsword to you
I will give you my great axe
Whats up
I am monkey
Which way is it too the capital city?
Pee Pee Poo Poo
I will talk to you later
I like the new king
You are getting on my nerves you jerk
I would like to buy 10 healing potions
How much will you give me for my silver axe?
I would like to give you this rock as a gift
